model.description:
The model to be used for the rerank request.

[See all of Together AI's rerank models](https://docs.together.ai/docs/serverless-models#rerank-models)

query.description: The search query to be used for ranking.
query.example: What animals can I find near Peru?

documents.description: List of documents, which can be either strings or objects.

example.title: Llama
example.text: The llama is a domesticated South American camelid, widely used as a meat and pack animal by Andean cultures since the pre-Columbian era.

example.title: Panda
example.text: The giant panda (Ailuropoda melanoleuca), also known as the panda bear or simply panda, is a bear species endemic to China.

example.title: Guanaco
example.text: The guanaco is a camelid native to South America, closely related to the llama. Guanacos are one of two wild South American camelids; the other species is the vicu√±a, which lives at higher elevations.

example.title: Wild Bactrian camel
example.text: The wild Bactrian camel (Camelus ferus) is an endangered species of camel endemic to Northwest China and southwestern Mongolia.

top_n.description: The number of top results to return.

return_documents.description: Whether to return supplied documents with the response.

rank_fields.description: List of keys in the JSON Object document to rank by. Defaults to use all supplied keys for ranking.
